alert.note: Alert for Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Richland and northeastern Sargent Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wyndmere to near Mantador. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hankinson, Lidgerwood, Wyndmere, Mantador, Great Bend, Barney and Geneseo. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
